original_text:
“Though evil is sweet in his mouth,
    though he hides it under his tongue,
korean_text: 그는 비록 악을 달게 여겨 혀 밑에 감추며

sentences.original_text: Though evil is sweet in his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 악이 그의 입에서 달다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: though he hides it under his tongue
